definition: bosom/heart/mind/to think of/to harbor in one's mind/to conceive (a child)

sentences.english: It's one of the most haunting and complex sounds in the animal kingdom.
sentences.chinese: 這是動物王國中最爲複雜，最令人難以忘懷的音樂。

sentences.english: It was a haunting vision, the past compellingly present.
sentences.chinese: 這是一幅令人難以忘懷的景象，過去分明就在眼前。

sentences.english: Send us a check today, do it now, so you will not forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票，以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: Leads people to not forget that fascinating dream.
sentences.chinese: 總讓人不能忘懷那令人陶醉的夢。

sentences.english: The thought of the pain which I must have caused him has haunted me ever since .
sentences.chinese: 從那時起，我一直想着我給他造成的痛苦，不能忘懷。

sentences.english: It is the ingratitude of nature.
sentences.chinese: 這種忘懷是屬於自然現象。

sentences.english: Send us a check today. Do it now, so you won't forget.
sentences.chinese: 請於今日立即寄出支票以免忘懷爲幸。

sentences.english: A long, long time ago, I can still remember, How that music used to make me smile.
sentences.chinese: 我仍不能忘懷那些舊時光，音樂總那麼令我愉快。

sentences.english: April, you are in the world, forgotten.
sentences.chinese: 你是四月天，在人間，無忘懷。

sentences.english: But even more difficult to forget was the finial examination paper.
sentences.chinese: 不過更令我難以忘懷的是期末論文。

sentences.english: For Google's employees in China, the day was also unforgettable. Not one of them had been alerted ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 對於谷歌中國的員工來說，這一天同樣註定難以忘懷。

sentences.english: The heart thright away from me truly loves never forgets.
sentences.chinese: 誠摯戀愛過的心永不忘懷。

sentences.english: I can't find the root of the sweet potato.
sentences.chinese: 山村的地瓜是我最不能忘懷的。

sentences.english: The scene bubbling with enthusiasm in those years, we could not forget it for many years.
sentences.chinese: 當年那種熱情奔放的情景，我們多年都未能忘懷。

sentences.english: My first year of drenching was certainly one to be remembered.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問我第一年給牲畜灌藥的經歷讓人難以忘懷。

sentences.english: The diversity and skilled band will make you unforgettable.
sentences.chinese: 樂隊表演的多樣性及純熟定會令你難以忘懷。

definition: (of a person) sad beyond words (idiom)/(of music, literature etc) poignant/very sentimental
to be a tax on (one's mind)/to bother/to trouble/to be concerned
to save or redeem (a situation)/to mediate/to intercede
the ways of the world/social behavior
lit. to dispel the clouds and see the sun (idiom); fig. to restore justice
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
lit. scattered ashes and dispersed smoke (idiom)/fig. to be annihilated/to vanish in a puff of smoke
